column5: Kicked up the Bradley today, did some brown and lake trouts for me and a bud of mine.  Good eats!

What flavor ya smoke 'em Matt?  Never had a Lake O greaser.  Funny with lakers how one place they can be great eats, and another gawd aweful.  Never tasted a brown though....  What are they like?  Bow, speck, laker?
Looks good MM. How did you prepare them before  smoking?

Morton smoke flavored sugar cure with hickory chips. Lakers are great tasting, I'm not wild about eating them any other way. The Browns are also good, taste like brookies to me The lakers were from Big Rideau lake
I soaked them for 16hrs in a wet soak  1Gal water 1/2 cup white sugar 1/2 cup brown sugar 1 cup Morton sugar cure  Then rinsed them off, air dried 2hrs and them smoked at 170 deg for 6 hrs
